programme.title: One Small Step
programme.desc: Oftentimes climate change and pollution can seem like unfathomably difficult problems to solve. Out host’s goal is to calm those fears by inviting the audience along with her as she strives to learn how to take action against the problems plaguing our planet. In One Small Step we explore how recycling works, where our waste goes, and how we can fix the planet through our actions as individuals. Hosted by Lucy Biggers, a growing influencer in the sustainability space.

programme.title: Sri Lanka: Monsoon Island

programme.title: The Hebrides: Land of Legends
programme.desc: The Hebrides archipelago is made up of more than 500 islands and islets, lying just off the coast of west Scotland. Isolation has made it the perfect breeding ground for millions of creatures.

programme.title: Japan: Islands of Extremes
programme.desc: Japan’s 7,000 islands stretch for over 2,400km, and cover an incredible range of climates. Winter in the northern islands can be savage, but summer in the southern islands couldn’t be more different.

programme.title: The Flying Kestrel

programme.title: Lunkerville S13:E5 "Slick Nick Goes to Fish College"
programme.desc: “Slick Nick” Petrou first appeared on Lunkerville when he was 14 years old and now he's back to show Mike how to catch smallmouth bass with swim baits in the spring weeks before he graduates from college with a Fisheries degree. Filmed Canadarago Lake, New York.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground S1:E1 "The Pursuit of Striped Bass"
programme.desc: Striped Bass fishing is firing along the Jersey Coast. Nick joins rock star Dean Ween and Capt.Freddy Gamboa for some jersey food and laughs in efforts to pursue the ultimate Northeast prize from the surf and from the boat.

programme.title: Saltwater Underground S1:E2 "The Cult of Blackfish"
programme.desc: Pursued with near maniacal passion, Nick dives into the serious cult of blackfishing joined by local salts Captain Sean Reilly and Capt. Sam Rescigno on the Mary M IV.

programme.title: "On Deck" With Captain Cory McGuire
programme.desc: For someone like Capt. Cory who's out on the water most days of the year, it's easy to notice the little changes that show the stress on an ecosystem. Whether that's subtle movements of fish from lingering red tide blooms or large-scale impacts from high-volume Lak Okeechobee discharges, he sees it all, and he's ready for things to change. "I wish we would get to a point where we really put our foot down and do something about it before it's too late." Watch this episode to learn more about what's going on and to see why Capt. Cory is so passionate about fighting to protect the places he loves. Visit https://captainsforcleanwater.org to join the fight.

programme.title: The Hunting Public S2:E5 "We Messed Up!"
programme.desc: We found a bunch more turkeys! Now will they cooperate??

programme.title: The Hunting Public S2:E6 "Evening Gobbler on Public Land!"
programme.desc: We hunted these turkeys ALL DAY and finally got our chance!

programme.title: Storytellers S1:E1 "The Hill"
programme.desc: This is the story of how FE Hill ranch got it's start. From its inception, FE Hill has created opportunities for people to experience the outdoors and create memories. For us, it has created a tradition of Fathers and Sons hunting together.

programme.title: Renegade Bass Tour E5 - "Qualifier 5 - Newboro Lake" (2020)
programme.desc: The Renegade Bass Tour finishes off the regular season on Newboro Lake where the Traeger Team of the Year and Classic Qualifiers will be decided.

programme.title: Guides Day Off S1:E1 "Tacos and Rojos"
programme.desc: The plan is to bag some snapper meat for tacos, then get shallow for some heart pumping redfish action.

programme.title: Breaking Point S8:E5 "Bull Bound"
programme.desc: Mike Mancl and his cousin Walter have been talking about doing an elk hunt together for years. The two of them both drew archery tags in Colorado and couldn’t wait to head west. Miles and miles of hiking, learning the area, and learning how to avoid hunting pressure would ultimately give Walt a chance at his first archery bull elk in Colorado.

programme.title: Breaking Point S8:E6 "Nora's Buck"
programme.desc: Chad and Heather Maves have done an excellent job of raising their daughters to understand and appreciate the sport of hunting. Nora, their oldest daughter, was excited to get in the woods and try and get her first deer. Little did she know, the young hunter would have a season to remember.

programme.title: Benelli Presents: Donnie Vincent’s Winds of Adak
programme.desc: In November of 2019, explorer and hunter Donnie Vincent traveled to Adak Island, Alaska. Located at the westernmost end in the Aleutian chain, Adak is wilderness with the exception of a now-abandoned naval base that once housed more than 6,000 people. Winds of Adak chronicles Donnie’s exploration of the island, a hauntingly desolate abandoned military outpost and three unique hunts—caribou, ptarmigan and sea ducks—as the unforgiving elements, the terrain and the Bering Sea test both man and equipment.

programme.title: Reel West Coast S3:E5 "Northern Rockies Lodge Part One"
programme.desc: Located in the Northernmost part of the Rocky Mountains, Brendan and Blake Sloan get dropped off by bush pilot to different alpine lakes and target 7 different species of fish using all different types of gear and techniques.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E5 "Our Best Jumbo Perch Bite Yet??" pt2
programme.desc: As we told you guys last week, this trip to South Dakota was second to none. If the bucket of Jumbo Perch doesn't tell you that, I don't know what will!

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E6 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes
programme.desc: Welcome to Part 1 of a 2 part Jumbo Perch search. Mike and the guys are excited for some ice fishing on unfamiliar lakes with their sights on crushing jumbo perch. Fish Addictions Staff members Taylor and Anthony put in a TON of research to find the lakes with not only the best current up to date netting/stocking reports but also the best potential for some quality jumbos.

programme.title: Fish Addictions S6:E7 "Crushing Jumbo Perch" Ice Fishing on Unfamiliar Lakes pt 2
programme.desc: Part 2 picks up right where Part 1 left off. The guys have a few lakes ahead, plus an insane night bite surprise!

programme.title: Two Conchs Sportfishing TV S2:E5 "Ladies, Ladies, Ladies"
programme.desc: Who says fishing is for the boys? This group of ladies is going out with Two Conchs for a few days and showing everyone that fishing isn't just for the men.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 5
programme.desc: There are even more twists and turns to be had at the Bicycle Casino where the players’ chip counts rise and fall with dramatic consequences. So far only one player has been eliminated and so five remain to fight for the chance to have their name engraved on the prestigious WPT Champion’s Cup. Off the felt anchor Kimberly Lansing takes a look at previous and current player of the year contenders while poker Hall of Famer Mike Sexton and Hollywood’s own Vince Van Patten guide us though the play to determine the WPT “legend of poker”.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 6
programme.desc: The Legends of Poker is coming to its thrilling conclusion in the third and final hour of WPT’s extended coverage at the Bicycle Casino. There have been some daring plays but it’s time to see whose gamble will pay off on this rollercoaster of a final table. Tony Dunst breaks it down in The Raw Deal while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring us all the surprises in the final hands of this exhilarating competition.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 7
programme.desc: The World Poker Tour has travelled to France for the celebrated Grand Prix de Paris and the final table is looking like a Who’s Who of international pros. Five of the finalists have won big time tournaments across the globe but right now the only amateur on the felt, Matt Salsberg, is in the chip lead. However, it won’t be an easy competition for anyone with season nine Grand Prix de Paris champion Theo Jorgensen up to make poker history by being the first to win the same WPT event twice. Kimberly Lansing anchors as Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the action at the Aviation Club de France.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 8
programme.desc: WPT’s coverage of the Grand Prix de Paris resumes at the grandiose Aviation Club de France where five players remain alive, bringing Theo Jorgensen one step closer to making poker history with a second Grand Prix de Paris title however, chip-leading Hollywood producer and so called amateur Matt Salsburg is still standing in his way, along with three gifted and aggressive international pros. Off the felt we take a look back at the best bluff from season ten while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call the dynamic action on this exciting final table.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 9
programme.desc: It’s a three way brawl in Paris when Hollywood producer, Matt Salzburg, comes up against two of the most successful poker pros of the last few years ruthless German pro Philipp Gruissem and season nine’s Grand Prix de Paris returning champ Theo Jorgensen. Commentators Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten bring you all the twists and turns in this exciting conclusion to the first televised international title of season eleven.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 10
programme.desc: World Poker Tour ignited the global poker boom with a unique television show based on a series of high-stakes tournaments. WPT events turned Gus Hansen into the Great Dane and Daniel Negreanu into Kid Poker, and created dozens of poker-made millionaires.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 11
programme.desc: It’s already proved to be a rollercoaster at the final table with three players finding themselves in the chip-leading position so far and all six surviving into our second hour of coverage. Off the felt we take a look back at a war of words in one of the best moments from the historic tenth season of WPT and more detailed analysis from resident poker expert Tony Dunst in The Raw Deal. Kimberly Lansing hosts while Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten give the sideline commentary at the renowned Borgata Poker Open.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 12
programme.desc: The casino that builds poker superstars has narrowed down the near 1200 starting competitors to the surviving four on the final table that is full of surprises. The third and final hour of WPT’s extended coverage is coming to a climactic conclusion at the Borgata Poker Open which means there’s not long left before an eminent champion is named. Kimberly Lansing anchors the intense competition as Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten call all the high stakes action at The Borgata Casino.

programme.title: The World Poker Tour Season 11 Episode 13
programme.desc: The venue where the World Poker Tour phenomenon all started eleven years go hosts the competition in name of a poker legend. Poker’s biggest names have won their titles here and it looks like this year may be no different with a final table stocked full of top level professional quality. Amongst the elite is Antonio “The Magician” Esfandiari, the all-time tournament money leader in poker history, who is up for his third title. Kimberly Lansing anchors the momentous event while in-house poker experts Mike Sexton and Vince Van Patten commentate on the action.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Dave Nihill - Documented
programme.desc: Dave is the winner of the prestigious 43rd annual San Francisco Comedy Competition, and runner up in the Moth’s largest US Grandslam storytelling competition.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:K-Von - Designer Muscles
programme.desc: Half-Persian and raised in a religious family, K-Von's comedy unites sharp cultural riffs with clean delivery. In this special he takes on political correctness, cyber bullying, and the utility of cargo pants.

programme.title: Chad Thornsberry - Junk-Cars & Valet Parking
programme.desc: Chad Thornsberry was born in St. Louis, MO. From an early age he learned his family was blessed, and blessed him with humor, quick wit, and a love of storytelling. Chad’s unique comedic perspective awards audience the opportunity to laugh at the common occurrences in everyday life. Often referred to as a great writer, his straightforward style allows audiences to laugh with him and at him as they find the humor in themselves. With reflections on growing up in a trailer park and observations as an English teacher, Chad’s satiric insights look at the pitfalls that make us human. With smart humor and a conversational style, Chad has delighted audiences from the trailer park, throughout the Midwest, and from coast to coast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Seth Tippetts - Tall. Dark. Gigante
programme.desc: Get to know Seth from the chest down. He’s big, he’s tall, but most of all he’s hilarious. Check out this Utah-raised, clean, and semi-professional comedian today!

programme.title: James Johann - Rurally Funny
programme.desc: James' childhood upbringing was significantly influenced by country music, countless bad hair cuts, and Catholic school. In 1991, James began his stand-up career in Kansas City. Today, James is a long-time veteran of the stand-up comedy circuit, performing at clubs across the country. His self-deprecating sense of humor and high energy style come together to create a unique onstage persona. James relies more on his brain than the profane and his comedy is a truthful and hilarious reflection of life as he sees it.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Jeff Jena - Old Dog, New Jokes
programme.desc: Jeffrey Jena is one of the top corporate and cruise comics working today. His thirty-three years of live performance experience and over forty national television shows, both as an actor and comic give him the ability to work for any audience

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Aaron Woodall - Sad and Needy
programme.desc: Between his first and second special, Aaron Woodalls perspective transitioned from a nice young man coming to grips with a dirty, cynical world to a deeper introspection of his own upbringing and biases.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Tom Ryan - Off The Verge
programme.desc: Over the years Tom Ryan has worked steadily at comedy clubs, concert venues, corporate functions and colleges across the U.S.. He has also made national television appearances on Showtime, A&E Comedy Central, and… Three times on “The Late Show with David Letterman!”. He has performed as the opening act in concert for: B.B. King, Tim Allen, Steven Wright, Natalie Cole, and Dennis Miller just to name a few. He has contributed monologue jokes to the award winning "Politically Incorrect with Bill Maher" and regularly headlines corporate events for companies ranging from Coca-Cola to Church and Dwight. Tom believes that the best comedy comes from the most unlikely sources.

programme.title: Tom Clark - I'm A Rescue
programme.desc: Tom Clark was born and raised, in that order. Clark’s mix of well-crafted jokes and spontaneous crowd work has led to appearances on TBS’s ‘Conan,’ CBS’s ‘Late Late Show, and Comedy Central’s ‘Premium Blend’. Clark has traveled coast to coast doing stand up and has performed internationally as part of New Faces at the prestigious‘Just For Laughs Comedy Festival’ in Montreal and on The Main Stage at ‘The Capetown Comedy Festival’ in South Africa. Clark is also an actor and has appeared on such shows as NBC’s ‘Outsourced’, TNT’s ‘The Closer’,and the Hallmark made for TV movie ‘The Wish List’. After landing the role on ‘Outsourced,’ director Ken Kwapis invited Clark to be in the Drew Barrymore movie, ‘Big Miracle’. You can also see Clark in Columbia Pictures ‘Freaks of Nature.’

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy:Paul Morrissey - A Real Humdinger
programme.desc: Paul was raised as a sports fanatic in the tiny town of Owego, in upstate New York. After four years of playing college basketball, somehow he graduated. Aside from playing in the NBA, his dream job was to talk about sports for a living. Paul then moved to California after landing a television sports anchor job but found out quickly that he was “too much of a smart-ass” for TV news. After he was fired, Paul took his unique sense of humor to comedy club stages all over the country. In 2005, Paul was selected to perform at the HBO Comedy Festival in Las Vegas. Morrissey has also been a finalist in several national comedy competitions including Wendy’s Comedy Challenge, Comedy Central’s Open Mic Fight and Maxim’s Real Men of Comedy.

programme.title: Rik Roberts - Put Down the Sweet Tea

programme.title: We Used to Eat Animals the Right Way - Here's What Changed
programme.desc: Dr. Bill Schindler explains why the processes we have in place today in the food industry lead to a less healthy and enriched lifestyle. The way humans eat animals has shifted. Our brains grew significantly once the human race started hunting its food. Diets that consisted of blood, guts, and organs contributed to that growth. These parts of animals are almost completely absent from modern day diets and these provided much more nutrition than just the animal's meat.

programme.title: Sydney, Australia featuring Bobby Lyle,Marion Meadows, Brian Culbertson
programme.desc: Australia's beautiful and iconic Sydney Harbor.

programme.title: Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Michigan featuring Alexander Zonjic,Jeff Lorber, Walter Beasley
programme.desc: Relax and explore Michigan's Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore.

programme.title: Frankenmuth, Michigan featuring Chris Botti,Eagles, Fourplay
programme.desc: A tour of Frankenmuth, from the picturesque Cass River and covered bridge to the Bavarian themed shops. Explore this popular Michigan vacation destination.

programme.title: Heceta Head Light, Florence, Oregon featuring Adam Haines,Ryan Fontanilla, Laurence Juber
programme.desc: The charming Heceta Head Lighthouse of Yachats, Oregon.

programme.title: Point Cabrillo Light, Caspar, California featuring Tracy Chapman,Peter Gabriel, The Bangles
programme.desc: Relax as the sun sets on this picturesque scene of Michigan's Manistique East Breakwater Light.

programme.title: Dubai, United Arab Emirates featuring Nils,Doc Powell, Bob Baldwin

programme.title: Cape Disappointment Light, Cape Disappointment, Washington featuring Peter White,David Benoit, George Benson
programme.desc: The stunning views of Cape Disappointment Light, and the cliffs and beachs of Washington's Pacific coast.

programme.title: Whale Beach, Australia featuring Acoustic Alchemy,Paul Hardcastle, Joyce Cooling
programme.desc: This quiet, sleepy shoreline is Whale Beach. Its part of the Northern Beaches in the suburbs of Sydney, Australia.

programme.title: Prairie Creek Redwoods State Park, California featuring Simon Wahl,Gabriel Mark Hasselbach, Brian Simpson
programme.desc: Relax among the trees of California's Prairie Creek Redwood State Park, a place of timeless beauty.

programme.title: Key West Lighthouse Key West, Florida featuring The Rippingtons,Nelson Rangell, Acoustic Alchemy
programme.desc: The Key West Lighthouse was built in 1847 to aid sailors around the shore's dangerous reefs. It was deactivated in 1969 and is now a museum providing tourists with historical insight and amazing views of the city.

programme.title: Little Sable Point Light, Mears, Michigan featuring John Tesh,Cassandra Wilson, David Lanz
programme.desc: A visit to the Little Sable Point Light on Lake Michigan. One of the unique features of this lighthouse is its color. The composition of its bricks allowed them to go unfinished, so the natural warm color of the stone shows, making it appear as an almost organic element on Michigan's scenic coastline.

programme.title: Titanic II
programme.desc: On the 100th anniversary of the original voyage, a modern luxury liner christened "Titanic II," follows the path of its namesake. But when a tsunami hurls an ice berg into the new ship's path, the passengers and crew must fight to avoid a similar fate.

programme.title: Trolland
programme.desc: Fenn the Troll hates the Troll pastime of pranking, and is teased so much for it that he runs away. But when a long-suffering park ranger starts capturing the other Trolls, it's up to Fenn to rescue his family and friends - without pranking.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: Astronomer George Herbert (C. Thomas Howell) is assigned to investigate reports of strange meteors crashing into earth near New York, Los Angeles and Washington, D.C. As the meteors land, enormous multi-limbed metal creatures disembark and begin destroying everything and everyone in their path with heat-ray guns. Amidst the apocalyptic destruction, Herbert teams with a soldier (Andy Lauer) and a pastor (Rhett Giles) on his journey into Washington to reunite with his family.

programme.title: Android Cop
programme.desc: In this futuristic, action-packed thriller, a cop and his robotic partner enter the Zone, a forbidden section of the city inhabited by a disease-stricken populace. Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles
programme.desc: In February 1942 US forces engaged an unidentified flying object above Los Angeles. Now almost 70 years later, the alien invaders have returned.

programme.title: CarGo
programme.desc: A young car learns the importance of family when he embarks on a mission to rescue his father - who's been sent to Clunker Island to be repurposed as junk metal.

programme.title: The Reconstruction of William Zero
programme.desc: A geneticist wakes up from an accident with only fragments of his memory is forced to relearn who he is via his twin brother. But as he digs deeper, he discovers he might not be who he thought at all.

programme.title: Sky Line
programme.desc: The concept of an elevator to space is not new. In the world of Arthur C. Clarke, it is a natural progression.

programme.title: Trouble's Brewing | Episode 5

programme.title: Powerless | Episode 6
programme.desc: With the ship trapped in a lightning storm, Karen struggles to persuade the crew to limit their power usage, while Stewart learns to pilot the ship manually with help from Zalian. Meanwhile, Kent attempts to re-educate Natasha, who has been reduced to the mental age of a child after the first lightning strike.

programme.title: DUST Collection | Adventures
programme.desc: Brave new worlds and amazing locales await in the new wild frontier of outer space adventures. What will you explore?

programme.title: First Contact | Episode 7
programme.desc: An alien appears in Stewart's dreams, but only seems to communicate if Stewart's dreams are erotic in nature. Stewart enlists both A.R.T. and Zalian's medicine cabinet in a dark, humiliating journey to make first contact. Karen slaps Michael in a rage over his tryst with Tina, and has to go undergo HR arbitration, overseen by an un-objective Tina.

programme.desc: Two opposing time travelers are sent back to the present to prevent a global biological disaster from occurring.

programme.title: Broken Star
programme.desc: Abandoned by her family, starlet Markey Marlowe is sequestered in a duplex with a reclusive landlord.

programme.title: Origin Unknown
programme.desc: After a deadly crash, Mackenzie Wilson assists an A.I. system to uncover a mystery under the surface of Mars.

programme.title: American Warfighter
